hero.core_tension: Depict the choice to front-load a flagship campaign and inventory for the high-value pre-Thanksgiving window versus pacing spend later — shown as layered campaign markers converging toward a single storefront moment, implying compressed opportunity and margin tradeoffs.
hero.setting: Studio backlot staged as a flagship prep room: polished concrete floor, a long wood planning table, racks with branded fabric swatches, and a scaled storefront diorama; three-quarter low angle to imply presence.
hero.persona: Retail operations lead and studio creative director collaborating side-by-side (operator + studio), leaning over the plan.
hero.action: Pinning phased campaign markers on a scaled plan, arranging miniature inventory crates, and adjusting a window mockup while gesturing to measured printouts.
hero.urgency_symbol: A set of graduated light bands and narrowing shadow slats across the diorama that visually tighten toward the storefront to suggest a shrinking high-value window (symbolic timing).
props: inventory crates and tagged SKU bundles
fabric swatches and printed weekly baselines
measuring tape and a clipboard with printed charts (no digital screens)
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, soft directional rim light on faces, and clean negative space around the table.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, anticipatory — confident but focused on timing tradeoffs.
hero.alt: Two people — a retail operations lead and a studio creative director — lean over a wood table in a studio staged like a flagship prep room. They pin phased campaign markers and arrange miniature inventory crates on a scaled storefront diorama. Polished editorial light creates confident highlights while narrowing shadow bands sweep toward the model to suggest a tightening holiday window.

signal_map.structure: Aerial composition of concentric rings and stepped arcs representing campaign phases (outer ring = pre-Thanksgiving, inner hub = Cyber Week) with a subtle lattice of connection lines tying flagships and pop-up nodes.
elements: phase tokens labeled S1, S2, S3, S4 (physical tokens)
footfall beads and threaded paths showing customer flow
conversion markers (small paper flags) and weekly baseline tabs
signal_map.motion: Converging arcs that flow from outer phase rings inward, with intermittent pauses (gaps between beads) to suggest week-by-week measurement and points to reallocate inventory and promo intensity.
signal_map.palette: Muted holiday palette — deep evergreen, warm ochre, slate gray — materials rendered as matte paper, translucent vellum overlays, and brushed brass pins for highlights.
signal_map.alt: Overhead view of a tactile signal map: concentric rings and stepped arcs knit together with brass pins and threads. Phase tokens labeled S1–S4, footfall beads, and weekly baseline tabs trace motion from the outer pre‑Thanksgiving ring into a Cyber Week hub, implying phased campaign flow.

case_studies.moment: Operator elects to move flagship campaign into the Nov 12 front‑loaded week to capture early shoppers; tension shown by a row of staggered pins leading toward the first phase.
case_studies.persona: Retail operations manager and in‑store planner collaborating.

case_studies.alt: Three-quarter overhead of a backroom planning table where a retail operations manager and planner position staggered pins along a printed phased schedule to front-load a flagship campaign. Crate mockups and last‑year baseline printouts sit nearby under polished editorial light.

case_studies.moment: Tuning a flagship activation to a local landmark event (parade weekend): the team rehearses placement and crowd lines with ribboned path markers that converge at the storefront entrance.
